mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: VidyaLink was born from a simple idea: the most valuable knowledge on campus is often sitting in the minds of our peers. We wanted to create a trusted, centralized platform to unlock that knowledge. Our mission is to build a collaborative learning community where every student has the power to both learn and teach. We replace scattered forum posts and word-of-mouth searches with a structured, safe, and reliable system for skill sharing.

features.name: Peer-to-Peer Marketplace
features.description: A dedicated space for students to publish and enroll in courses. Tutors can set their price and choose between online (with uploaded materials like videos and PDFs) or offline (live, in-person) sessions.

features.name: Intelligent Search
features.description: Our powerful search bar allows learners to instantly find courses based on specific skills (e.g., 'data science', 'guitar'). Courses are tagged with relevant skills to ensure accurate results.

features.name: Faculty Endorsement System
features.description: To ensure quality, our esteemed faculty members can review and endorse student tutors. Endorsed tutors are highlighted, giving learners a clear indicator of trusted and verified expertise.

features.name: Secure Authentication
features.description: User accounts are tied to unique College PRNs, ensuring that VidyaLink remains an exclusive and secure platform for our campus community.

features.name: Personalized Profiles
features.description: Every user has a profile to track their published courses or enrolled sessions, creating a personalized learning dashboard.

features.name: Dark Mode
features.description: A sleek dark mode with a smooth transition, designed for comfortable viewing during late-night study sessions.

roles.title: Our Community
roles.student_role: Students are the heart of VidyaLink. As Learners, they can discover new skills and get academic help. As Tutors, they can monetize their expertise, build a reputation, and gain valuable teaching experience.
roles.faculty_role: Faculty members play a crucial role as mentors and curators. By endorsing skilled students, they guide learners toward high-quality content and help recognize and reward student talent on campus.
